purpose: Facilitates the threat modeling and visualization of AI agents developed using various popular frameworks.
principle: Builds on AI agent frameworks such as LangGraph, AutoGen, and CrewAI to model and visualize potential threats.
reusability: Offers command-line interface for integration with existing development workflows, supports different AI frameworks.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for some AI frameworks and lacks comprehensive documentation.
name: Agent-Wiz
description: A CLI tool for threat modeling and visualizing AI agents built using popular frameworks like LangGraph, AutoGen, CrewAI, and more.
highlight: Unique CLI tool for threat modeling and visualizing AI agents, integrating with popular frameworks like LangGraph and AutoGen.
